articles.author: Melissa Alonso, Brian Fung, Catherine Thorbecke
articles.title: AT&T customers report a massive outage, disrupting phone service across America - CNN
articles.description: AT&T’s network went down for many of its customers across the United States Thursday morning, leaving customers unable to place calls, text or access the internet. By late morning, the company said most of its network had been restored.

articles.title: Wendy Williams' niece on why Williams says she is choosing to tell her story in doc - Good Morning America
articles.description: Wendy Williams' niece, Alex Finnie, opens up to "Good Morning America" about Williams' health and the upcoming Lifetime documentary, "Where is Wendy Williams?"
